img.alt: A snake holds a large egg in its mouth.
After the snake swallows the egg, it bulges behind the snake's head
The egg bulge moves further down the snake's long body.

caption.em: How can a snake swallow and digest an egg? Humans aren't capable of feats like this. Our jaws aren't flexible enough, for one thing. The human digestive system, however, moves food along with the same kind of muscular contractions that the snake uses.
